readable.title: 3486340101_ff01d8f3f9
readable.content: A blue race car is coming around a corner . A blue Subaru rally car turning a corner with spectators . A group of fans cheer the blue mountain racing car as it rounds the corner . Blue race car raises dust cloud on road as spectators take photos . Spectators are taking pictures of a blue rally car that is driving around a bend in the track .
